EmailTemplate.name: Homeowner Lead Marketing Automation
EmailTemplate.subject: Save Thousands with Palmetto Solar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Going Solar with Palmetto! We have received your request and one of our Energy Advisers will be in touch with you shortly.
We look forward to speaking with you!
The Palmetto Team
